item.description:
Come to the singles event everyone is talking about

Beer and Fusion Martini Tastings
DJ and Dancing
At the next Find a Keeper Singles Event
Friday, May 14, 6 p.m.
The Delaney House, Rte.5, Holyoke, MA


Party on the Patio (Weather Permitting)
Yes, we have our own private patio!

READ ON FOR THE EXCITING DETAILS!!!!


The Ira of The Ira’s Singles Events is Co-hosting Find a Keeper,
a new concept in events for singles 40 and over.



ALWAYS FUN, ORGINAL, CREATIVE, AND BEST OF ALL, AN OPPORTUNITY

TO FIND A KEEPER!!


You guessed it: The name of Event Series is: FIND A KEEPER (Maybe, no more need to search hours and hours on the internet for your match, just maybe).

Find a Keeper is a singles night for grownups – 40 and over --co-hosted by The Ira
of the always-fun and welcoming The Ira’s Single Events. Yes, branching out into Western Massachusetts. A chance to meet and mingle with your next door Massachusetts Single neighbors…. (Yay - for expanding your horizons!!)

Join us to eat, drink, mingle, dance and meet new people – maybe find the person you’ve been looking for and people who may share common interests and activities. At the very least, you’ll have a great time in a warm and inviting atmosphere -- all with The Ira’s own brand of personal introductions for all.

Pictures from last two events on 3/20 and 4/16. http://singles.meetup...
http://singles.meetup...

More than 240 singles have attended our first two successful events!!
We’ve heard that some matches were made, and people are dating!


THE EXCITING DETAILS BELOW:

WHEN: Friday. May 14, 2010. 6:00 p.m. - whenever

COST: $25.00- You ask? What does this cover?

6:00- 7:00- Mingling, enjoying an assortment of great food, the mixing and pouring of your favorite libations

7:00- More of: Mingling, Eating, Libations

8:00- ? Now that we have eaten, and had a few drinks, let's kick it up a notch and heat up the dance floor

Critically Acclaimed and almost known from around the world: an Awesome DJ from Marx Entertainment (And how lucky are we?) rocking the house with your favorite tunes and taking requests.


WHERE: Delaney House (Grand Ballroom) 1 Country Club Road, Holyoke, MA 01040. 413-532-1800 (I can hear you now- OMG- it is so far… That is why you have a car and a GPS System, plus a friend or two to car pool with. Don’t stay at home and complain, do join) Besides, the weather’s perfect for a drive.

WHERE IS THE FOOD YOU ASK?

Concept food stations (This means more than one food station) which includes:


* Crudités *
Assorted Vegetables with Dip
Chaffer with Coconut Chicken
with Red Chili Sauce
***
***
* Station 1 *
Garlic Bread
BBQ Beef Brisket
Roasted Potatoes
Buttered Green Beans
***
* Station 2 *
Create Your Own Hoagie
Sausage, Veal or Chicken
with Grilled Peppers & Onions
Cheese Platter & Rolls
Housemaid Potato Chips
***
* Station 3 *
Shrimp Skewers
Chicken Kabobs
Rice Pilaf
Curried Zucchini
***
* Station 4 *
Chocolate Covered Strawberries
Assorted Cannolis
NY Cheesecake with assorted sauces
***
* Station 5 *
Coffee Station
Coffee, Decaf & Assorted Teas






Plus- Bartenders to prepare your favorite cocktails. Cash Bar/Credit Card Bar….Lol.

For tickets, call 413-535-5077 or visit: http://www.logcabin-d...

Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: May 14. Find a Keeper Series.
Questions: 860-604-5792. For other exciting Single Events, please see:
www.the irassinglesevents.com
item.how_to_find_us: Ballroom of the Delaney House. Left upon entering the Lobby
item.name: The Ira. Party on the Patio, DJ, Dancing, Beer & Martini Fushion Tastings
